messages.title: Voting Labour in this election is vital if you want to see a new way of doing things, where community comes first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in police and vital services so we can cut crime.
Deliver a world class Whipps Cross to meet the needs of our growing population.
Ensure every child reaches their full potential. We will reverse school cuts and funding issues.
We will bring back credible deal alongside a remain option for you to have a final say.
Invest to keep our town centres alive.

issues.brexitEurope: Crashing out of the EU with no deal will make us all worse off.
issues.education: High quality education for all - Ensure every child reaches their full potential. We will reverse school cuts.
issues.environment: As a mother of young children I am concerned about rising pollution which can lead to severe asthma in children.
issues.health: Invest in Whipps Cross Hospital and social care - Deliver a world class Whipps Cross.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a local resident, I will put my energy into fighting for my home town.

politicalExperience.achievements: Using my experience as an advocate for change at global level to internationally running small campaigns, and what I've learned from running the United Nations.

endorsements.endorsement: I know she will push for a vote on the final Brexit deal and campaign to remain in the EU.

As a mother of young children I am concerned about rising pollution which can lead to severe asthma in children. Faiza has supported local campaigns against pollution and I know she will fight for better asthma health provision.
